des: "Good kids' snack - crunchy taco shells filled with mashed potatoes, French fried onions, sour cream, butter, and cheese. Top with additional sour cream, cheese, French fried onions, and hot or mild sauce."
ins:
Prepare the dry potato flakes according to package directions. Warm the taco shells according to package directions.
In a bowl, mix the prepared mashed potatoes, butter, sour cream, Cheddar cheese, and French-fried onions.
Fill the taco shells with the mashed potato mixture, and serve with taco sauce.
